entry.title: Water Caustics Effect for URP v2

link.href: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Water Caustics Effect for URP v2/ignore-index-en/

entry.id: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Water Caustics Effect for URP v2/ignore-index-en/

content.xml:base: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Water Caustics Effect for URP v2/ignore-index-en/

entry.content:
‥∴∵ Thanks 500+ downloads ∵∴‥
This asset easily adds the beautiful caustics essential for realistic water representation.

➡ Manual PDF
This asset contains two modules:
a Texture Generator and an Effect.


■ 1. Water Caustics Tex Generator [ URP / HDRP / Built-inRP ]
•Generates rich, realistic caustics animated textures at runtime by simulating waves and light refraction with Compute Shader.
•Possible to create not only realistic but also cartoon-like expressions.
•This generator works with all rendering pipelines.
•All parameters modifiable via script.
•[Features] 4 Wave Layers, 3 Drawing Styles, Chromatic Aberration, Blur, Directional Blur, RGB Color Shift, Gamma, Brightness Adjustment, etc.


■ 2. Water Caustics Effect [ URP(3D) only ]
•Apply caustics effects using the camera's depth and normal textures.
•VR supported.
•Forward、Forward+ and Deferred rendering supported.
•All parameters modifiable via script.
•It is also possible to apply individually by embedding Custom Function in shaders. Materials that are not rendered in depth textures, such as transparent textures, can be applied with this method. (Shader Graph, HLSL, and Amplify Shader Editor supported.)
•[Features] Range specification by Rectangle/Image/Stencil mask, Attenuation by Depth and Distance, Random Texture Tiling, Texture Rotation, RGB Color Shift, Transparency Effect, Draw Timing Adjustment, etc.


[ Unity 2020.3 LTS or higher supported ]
[ PC / MAC / iOS / Android / Switch / Quest2 tested]
[ DX11,12 / Metal / Vulkan / OpenGL / GLES3.1 supported ]
※ Tested with Unity 2020.3.20, 2021.3.33, 2022.3.22, 6000.0.28
※ WebGL is not supported because it does not support Compute Shader.


※ All code is included.
※ The specification of URP is still in flux. Therefore, please be aware that it may not work in the future when the URP version is upgraded.
※ If you encounter problems, please first check the Troubleshooting of Manual PDF, and if not resolved, please let me know in this way. I will support you as soon as possible.

mail: support_asset@hacoapp.com
twitter: @m_hakozaki

entry.title: Water Caustics Effect for URP v2
entry.content:
‥∴∵ 感谢500+次下载 ∵∴‥
此资源轻松添加了实现真实水面表现所必需的美丽光斑效果。

➡ 手册 PDF
此资源包含两个模块：
一个纹理生成器和一个效果。

■ 1. 水面光斑纹理生成器 [ URP / HDRP / Built-inRP ]
•通过计算着色器模拟波浪和光的折射，在运行时生成丰富、真实的动态光斑纹理。
•不仅可以创建真实的效果，还可以生成卡通风格的表现。
•该生成器适用于所有渲染管线。
•所有参数均可通过脚本修改。
•[功能] 4个波浪层，3种绘制风格，色差，模糊，方向模糊，RGB颜色偏移，伽马，亮度调整等。

■ 2. 水面光斑效果 [ 仅支持 URP(3D) ]
•使用相机的深度和法线纹理应用光斑效果。
•支持虚拟现实（VR）。
•支持前向、前向+和延迟渲染。
•所有参数均可通过脚本修改。
•也可以通过在着色器中嵌入自定义函数单独应用。未在深度纹理中渲染的材质，例如透明纹理，可以通过此方法应用。（支持Shader Graph、HLSL和Amplify Shader Editor。）
•[功能] 通过矩形/图像/模板遮罩指定范围，按深度和距离衰减，随机纹理平铺，纹理旋转，RGB颜色偏移，透明效果，绘制时机调整等。

[ 支持 Unity 2020.3 LTS 或更高版本 ]
[ 已测试 PC / MAC / iOS / Android / Switch / Quest2 ]
[ 支持 DX11,12 / Metal / Vulkan / OpenGL / GLES3.1 ]
※ 在 Unity 2020.3.20, 2021.3.33, 2022.3.22, 6000.0.28 中测试
※ 不支持 WebGL，因为它不支持计算着色器。

※ 所有代码均已包含。
※ URP的规范仍在不断变化。因此，请注意在URP版本升级后，它可能无法正常工作。
※ 如果您遇到问题，请首先检查手册PDF中的故障排除，如果未能解决，请通过这种方式告诉我。我会尽快支持您。

邮件: support_asset@hacoapp.com
推特: @m_hakozaki

entry.title: RapidIcon | In-Editor Icon Generator
entry.content:
An icon generator for your models and prefabs that works inside of Unity

RapidIcon is an easy to use icon generator/creator for your models and prefabs


Simply navigate to the folder in your project where your models are saved, select the icons you wish to edit, edit them if you need to, and then export them


Features included:

  • Full asset browser which automically detects all models and prefabs
  • Batch editing of icons
  • Batch export of icons
  • Create multiple variations for each icon
  • Modify object position, rotation and scale in the icon
  • Modify visibility of child objects
  • Modify camera, postion and rotation
  • Modify object animations
  • Orthographic or perspective camera projection
  • Modify ambient and directional light (colour, direction and intensity)
  • Apply post-processing shaders to the icon (image-effect shaders)
  • Five post-processing shaders included
  1. Image overlay
  2. Image underlay
  3. Mask
  4. Transparancy
  5. HSV
  • Supports virtually any image-effect shader so create your own or download from the store
  • Save post-processing presets to load later on
  • Toggle premultiplied alpha
  • Switch between point, billinear, and trillinear filtering
  • Change the export resolution (min: 8x8, max: 2048x2048)
  • Icons exported into the project assets folder will have the asset import settings automically set correctly

Please read the documenation for full details

If you have any questions, please get in touch and I will be happy to help

entry.title: RapidIcon | In-Editor Icon Generator
entry.content:
一个适用于您的模型和预制件的图标生成器，能够在Unity内部工作

RapidIcon是一个易于使用的图标生成器/创建工具，适用于您的模型和预制件

只需导航到项目中保存模型的文件夹，选择您希望编辑的图标，如果需要可以进行编辑，然后导出它们

包含的功能：

  • 完整的资源浏览器，能够自动检测所有模型和预制件
  • 批量编辑图标
  • 批量导出图标
  • 为每个图标创建多个变体
  • 修改图标中对象的位置、旋转和缩放
  • 修改子对象的可见性
  • 修改相机的位置和旋转
  • 修改对象的动画
  • 正交或透视相机投影
  • 修改环境光和方向光（颜色、方向和强度）
  • 将后期处理着色器应用于图标（图像效果着色器）
  • 包含五个后期处理着色器
  1. 图像叠加
  2. 图像底层
  3. 遮罩
  4. 透明度
  5. HSV
  • 支持几乎所有的图像效果着色器，因此可以创建自己的或从商店下载
  • 保存后期处理预设以便后续加载
  • 切换预乘阿尔法
  • 在点、双线性和三线性过滤之间切换
  • 更改导出分辨率（最小：8x8，最大：2048x2048）
  • 导出到项目资源文件夹的图标将自动设置正确的资源导入设置

请阅读文档以获取完整细节

如果您有任何问题，请与我联系，我将很乐意提供帮助
